general_advisory: Rice: Drain out excess water from paddy fields and monitor for disease pests. Sugarcane: Collect setts and manage sett rot. Blackgram: Spray to reduce incidence of diseases. Rapeseed & Mustard: Control pests. Vegetables: Specific spraying recommendations. Pisciculture: Symptoms of white spot disease and treatment. Animal Science: Dietary recommendations for animals.
